HGE::Channel_Pause

Pauses an audio channel. 

void Channel_Pause(
  HCHANNEL channel
);

Parameters

channel
Handle of an audio channel to be paused.

Requirements

Header: hge.h
Import library: hge.lib

Remarks

Use Channel_Resume function to resume a paused channel.

See also

Channel_Resume, Channel_Stop, Channel_StopAll
